br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.interfaces

Interface AdvantageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Advantage

    public interface AdvantageListener
    Interface that implements common methods used by Advantage instance.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
    created on: 06/02/2014
    See Also:
    Attribute.Type

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(long id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, int[] increment, int cost, Advantage.Type type)
      Creates a instance of Advantage.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(long id,
          java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          int[] increment,
          int cost,
          Advantage.Type type)
        Creates a instance of Advantage.
        Parameters:
        id - - object's identifier.
        name - - object's name. It can be null, but it's not recommended.
        description - - object's description. It can be null.
        increment - - amount of increment that will be sum to attributes. See Attribute.Type to index the param.
        cost - - object's cost to be added on Adventurer.
        type - - variable to set if it's advantage or disadvantage.
